participant_1.background:
I'd rather not disclose my family's occupations.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i wish i didn t have to work.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.

participant_2.background:
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.
I am a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.
I'm proud of my ability to make the most of Halloween and enjoy it in my own way.
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm glad to hear that. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always been impressed by people who can bake.
Thank you! It's something I've always enjoyed doing.
What's your favorite thing about baking?
I love the process of creating something beautiful and delicious.
That sounds really nice. I'm more of a savory cook myself, but I can appreciate the artistry of baking.
I'm sure you're a great cook! I love savory food too, but there's something special about a delicious cake.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that. I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Me too! I love trying new things in the kitchen.
I think we'd make good baking buddies.
I think so too! We should bake together sometime.
